Body:
"""
        Test 'handle_destination_dir_data' synchronizes unmatched destination
        data to source.
        """
sync = Sync(FAKE_MTP_DETAILS, '/tmp', 'Card/Music', unmatched=SYNCHRONIZE)
sync.set_source_abs()
sync.set_destination_abs()
sync.handle_destination_dir_data({'src_dir_abs': '/tmp/testdir',
    'dst_dir_fls': [
    '/run/user/<user>/gvfs/mtp:host=%5Busb%3A002%2C003%5D/Card/Music/testdir/song.mp3'
    ], 'dst_dir_abs':
    '/run/user/<user>/gvfs/mtp:host=%5Busb%3A002%2C003%5D/Card/Music/testdir'})
mock_copy_file.assert_called_once_with(dst_file='/tmp/testdir/song.mp3',
    src_file=
    '/run/user/<user>/gvfs/mtp:host=%5Busb%3A002%2C003%5D/Card/Music/testdir/song.mp3'
    )
patch.object(pysyncdroid.sync.Sync, 'copy_file')
